meanings.definition: To provide lodging or space for someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The hotel accommodates guests from all over the world.
meanings.sent2: The Airbnb listing accommodates up to six people comfortably.
meanings.sent3: The tent tried to accommodate the entire family, but it was a tight fit.
meanings.sent4: The garage accommodates our car like a cozy shelter.
meanings.sent5: The new apartment accommodates all our belongings perfectly.

meanings.definition: To fit in with the needs or wishes of someone.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant accommodates special dietary requests with a smile.
meanings.sent2: Good customer service accommodates the preferences of each individual.
meanings.sent3: The flexible schedule accommodates unexpected changes easily.
meanings.sent4: Her kind nature accommodates everyone's feelings like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The tailor accommodates his clients' style preferences effortlessly.

meanings.definition: To make adjustments or changes to suit a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: The teacher accommodates different learning styles in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The software accommodates various screen sizes for user convenience.
meanings.sent3: The recipe can accommodate substitutions if needed.
meanings.sent4: The team accommodates new strategies to improve performance.
meanings.sent5: The design accommodates future expansions seamlessly.
